abstract: David Pogue reviews his own cellphone, the LG8700, offered by Verizon.
snippet: David Pogue reviews his own cellphone, the LG8700, offered by Verizon.
lead_paragraph: Well, it's finally happened: I've run out of things to review. Yes, every computer, camera, camcorder, Web site, music player and phone—done.

headline.main: The Pros and Cons of the LG8700 Cellphone
